alert.note: Alert for Tippah; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 3:25PM CDT until May 02 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Southern Tippah County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 325 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Albany, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... New Albany, Ripley, Blue Mountain, Keownville, Falkner, Dumas, Cotton Plant, Shari, Union Hill, Murry, Martintown, Wallerville, Concord, Pumpkin Center, Molino, Clarysville, Baker, Peoples, Beacon Hill and Smalco. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
